      • getNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getNpcs​(java.util.function.Predicate<net.runelite.api.NPC> predicate)
        Retrieves a stream of NPCs filtered by a given condition.

        This method filters NPCs based on the specified predicate, allowing for flexible selection of NPCs based on various attributes such as name, interaction status, health, etc.

        Parameters:
        predicate - A Predicate that defines the filtering condition for NPCs.
        Returns:
        A sorted Stream of NPC objects that match the given predicate.

        actions - Action to take: "Attack"
        Returns:

      • getNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getNpcs()
        Retrieves a stream of all NPCs in the game world.

        This method is a shorthand for getNpcs(Predicate) that retrieves all NPCs without applying any filtering conditions.

        Returns:
        A sorted Stream of all NPC objects in the game world.

      • getNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getNpcs​(java.lang.String name,
                                                             boolean exact)
        Retrieves a stream of NPCs filtered by name.

        This method searches for NPCs with a specified name and filters them based on whether the match should be exact or allow partial matches.

        Filtering behavior:

        • If exact is true, the NPC name must match exactly (case insensitive).
        • If exact is false, the NPC name must contain the given name (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the NPC to search for.
        exact - true to match the name exactly, false to allow partial matches.
        Returns:
        A Stream of NPC objects that match the given name criteria.

      • getNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getNpcs​(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieves a stream of NPCs filtered by partial name match.

        This method is a shorthand for getNpcs(String, boolean) with partial matching enabled.

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the NPC to search for.
        Returns:
        A Stream of NPC objects whose names contain the given string.

      • getNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getNpcs​(int id)
        Retrieves a stream of NPCs filtered by their ID.
        Parameters:
        id - The unique identifier of the NPC to search for.
        Returns:
        A Stream of NPC objects that match the given NPC ID.

      • getAttackableNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getAttackableNpcs()
        Retrieves a stream of attackable NPCs.

        This method filters NPCs based on the following conditions:

        • The NPC has a combat level greater than 0.
        • The NPC is not dead.
        • The NPC is not currently interacting with another entity unless the player is in a multi-combat area.

        The resulting stream of NPCs is sorted by proximity to the player, with closer NPCs appearing first.

        Returns:
        A sorted Stream of NPC objects that the player can attack.

      • getAttackableNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getAttackableNpcs​(boolean reachable)
        Retrieves a stream of attackable NPCs based on specified criteria.

        This method filters NPCs based on the following conditions:

        • The NPC has a combat level greater than 0.
        • The NPC is not dead.
        • If reachable is true, the NPC must be reachable from the player's current location.
        • The NPC is either not interacting with any entity or is interacting with the local player.

        The resulting stream of NPCs is sorted by proximity to the player, with closer NPCs appearing first.

        Parameters:
        reachable - If true, only include NPCs that are reachable from the player's current location. If false, include all NPCs matching the other criteria regardless of reachability.
        Returns:
        A sorted Stream of NPC objects that the player can attack.

      • getAttackableNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getAttackableNpcs​(java.lang.String name,
                                                                       boolean exact)
        Retrieves a stream of attackable NPCs filtered by name.

        This method first filters NPCs based on attackable criteria, then applies name filtering:

        • The NPC must meet the conditions defined in getAttackableNpcs().
        • If exact is true, the NPC name must match exactly (case insensitive).
        • If exact is false, the NPC name must contain the given name (case insensitive).
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the NPC to search for.
        exact - true to match the name exactly, false to allow partial matches.
        Returns:
        A sorted Stream of NPC objects that match the given name and are attackable.

      • getAttackableNpcs

        public java.util.stream.Stream<net.runelite.api.NPC> getAttackableNpcs​(java.lang.String name)

        Checks if this NPC is within a specified distance from the player. Uses client thread for safe access to player location.
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - Maximum distance in tiles

        Returns:
        true if within distance, false otherwise

      • interactReflect

        public boolean interactReflect​(net.runelite.api.NPC npc,
                               java.lang.String action)
        Interacts with an NPC using a specified action.

        This method performs interaction logic, including:

        • Checking if the NPC is reachable.
        • Handling cases where the bot repeatedly fails to reach the NPC.
        • Determining the correct MenuAction for the specified interaction.
        • Executing the interaction via the RuneLite menu system.

        If the NPC cannot be reached after multiple attempts, the bot will pause all scripts and notify the user.

        Parameters:
        npc - The NPC to interact with.
        action - The action to perform on the NPC (e.g., "Talk-to", "Attack", "Trade").
        Returns:
        true if the interaction was successfully executed, false if the NPC was unreachable.

      • getHeadIcon

        public static net.runelite.api.HeadIcon getHeadIcon​(net.runelite.api.NPC npc)
        Returns the head icon for an NPC if it exists. A head icon would be a prayer the NPC is prayer: i.e. Hunlleff's prayers or Nex's deflect melee.
        Parameters:
        npc - NPC to check
        Returns:
        HeadIcon
